title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA)
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward interview, but the interview committee seemed scattered at times. One of the interviewers seemed hostile and discriminating. Generally, the overall impression of the interview was that this institution is rather unprofessional.
Interview Questions: How would you design a syllabus for X course

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Southern University
Interview Descriptions: It wasn’t too long. It was very casual conversation to make sure that your skills aligned with the department. Everyone was very kind  and helpful. The interviewer made me feel comfortable
Interview Questions: What are your strengths in relation to the role?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Research assistant and Graduate assistant job at southern university and A&M College . Review of projects and research  transcripts GPA recommendations and past work experiences, technical questions  and answers  with objectives
Interview Questions: Research  graduate assistant , teaching assistant , study roll

title: Administrative Assistant III Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 8 weeks. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Applied for the job online and patiently waited for a phone call to see if I received the job.
Once I received the phone call, I was given directions on what the next steps would be. I was interviewed and then offered the position. I accepted and was sent to Human Resources to fill out the rest of the paperwork that was needed because I was transferring from another department on campus.
Interview Questions: Q: As an Administrative Assistant, what is my main goal in the office?

title: Accounting Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: One interviewer in closed room private, very personable, ask questions dealing with the task. Brief overview of the task and how they are to be handled. Educated on being able to work well with others.
Interview Questions: How well do you work with other

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: My interview lasted all of 20 minutes. They asked a few questions, nothing too difficult. Now that I'm employed here, I know why - the job isn't difficult. I mostly answer the phone and give out pamphlets to students seeking information.
Interview Questions: Nothing really stands out as far as questioning. They did ask about my skills regarding technology, although my answer doesn't really apply to my position because I rarely use them.

title: Graduate Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interview process is not difficult. You will have to meet professors and complete an application. Filled applications should be given to Dr.Carriere of civil engineering. It can also be given to Dr.Trivedi of computer science for review and applying.

title: Recruiter Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview process varies from each department. It helps if you know someone who can put in a good word for you.
Interview Questions: Most questions are about you and your personality

title: Graduate Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: Telephonic interview conducted to assess my skills and willingness to manage the front desk responsibilities in the department of Political Science apart from the regular responsibilities of a graduate student assistant
Interview Questions: How soon I could join the job

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Southern University (Baton Rouge, LA) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: In order to get an interview, you had to have proper connections with the faculty and staff and quickly establish interest in the position you desired. It's honestly a popularity contest and employers pick who they like the most versus who has the most qualifications. However, most of the time the candidates in question are both qualified and in favor with the faculty. Then details are asked about whether you can juggle working and other responsibilities, ectera....
